titles.title: Expressing the sense of Congress that a commemorative postage stamp should be issued honoring Bil Keane.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: 5/25/2012--Introduced. Expresses the sense of Congress that a commemorative postage stamp should be issued by the United States Postal Service in honor of Bil Keane (a cartoonist best known for the "Family Circus" comic strip).
